message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $18,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but that's too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $10,000.
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $14,000.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice.  How about we settle at $11,000? That's a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob, but I'm still a bit above your offer. I'm willing to come down to $13,500. I think it's a fair price for the product's value.
